entries.journal_entry_description: You're on the trail of the missing pilot, but are you getting into something deeper than you expected?
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to Narmle's gambling hall between dusk and dawn to speak with Kaila Min.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to the location that Kaila gave you as to where she saw the missing pilot.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Black Sun thugs ambushed you at the site where the pilot was last seen.  Kill them all.  Maybe one of them has information.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You survuved the Black Sun ambush and found a datapad with the location: 4846, -1084
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Go to the location that you found on the datapad and see what is there.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Talk to Tovar Blackmoor, the chemist working with the Black Sun.  Maybe he will give you information.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: So, the Rebel Alliance is smuggling the new spice and the Black Sun want in on the action.  There is still no sign of the missing pilot. (Chapter 2 complete, but the story will continue.)
